Projects Blog by james 2024-01-17 1 Project Biden Project Biden is tracking the approval ratings since the beginning of the first term in 2021. The polls used are sourced from 538.com and filtered by their A ratings 1.1 Biden approval tracking The tracking uses polls with rating of A by 538.com. The pollsters/firms used are ABC/Washington Post, Beacon/Shaw(Fox News),Cygnal(Republican),Marist Polls(NPR/PBS),Monmouth University, PPP(Democratic),Quinnipiac University,Selzer & Co(Grinnell College),Siena/NYT and suffolk University. 1.2 Methodology used by pollsters Majority of the polls are conducted through the live phone and the others are a mix of live phone,online panel and text based. 1.3 All the pollsters All the pollsters compared against each other with the polls they have conducted and shows how Biden is viewed by the public.
